TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TrafficManagerManagementClientExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Windows Azure Traffic Manager management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure Traffic Manager service for creating, updating, listing, and deleting Traffic Manager profiles and definitions. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn166981.aspx for more information)
